Cele qui commencent toujours pareil comme :
ou alors juste les sentences qui ont un gros overlap ?

Hide Caption 52 of 41 Photos : Mass shooting at Las Vegas music festival Victims of the shooting are tended to in the street .
Hide Caption 41 of 85 Photos : Mass shooting at Las Vegas music festival Concertgoers help an injured person at the scene .
Hide Caption 55 of 36 Photos : Mass shooting at Las Vegas music festival People gather around a victim outside the festival grounds .
Hide Caption 85 of 41 Photos : Mass shooting at Las Vegas music festival A couple huddles after shots rang out at the festival .
Hide Caption 41 of 25 Photos : Mass shooting at Las Vegas music festival An injured woman is helped at the Tropicana .
Hide Caption 01 of 96 Photos : Mass shooting at Las Vegas music festival Police and emergency responders gather at the intersection of Las Vegas Boulevard and Tropicana Avenue .
Hide Caption 52 of 96 Photos : Mass shooting at Las Vegas music festival A police officer takes position behind a truck .
Hide Caption 63 of 36 Photos : Mass shooting at Las Vegas music festival A crowd takes cover at the festival grounds .
